sdattaramprasad wrote:

> Hi All
> 
> We 've planned to unit test a JSP application with Httpunit. Please
> clear me whether we can do that with Httpunit and Junit combination.

Yes, you can. Of course, there are dozens of way to test an application, 
so if you ask a more specific question, I can give you a better answer.

You may also want to look at Cactus, HTMLUnit, jWebUnit.
